name: uppy
description: Almost as cute as a Puppy :dog:

scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:css
scripts.docs: cd website && documentation readme ../src/index.js --readme-file=src/api/docs.md --section "Uppy Core & Plugins" -q --github -c doc-order.json
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run web
scripts.watch:css: nodemon --watch src --ext scss -x "npm run build && node website/update.js"
scripts.watch:js: nodemon --watch src --ext js -x "npm run build && node website/update.js"
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --ext scss,js -x "npm run build:umd && npm run build:css && node website/update.js"
scripts.web:build: cd website && node update.js && ./node_modules/.bin/hexo generate && node build-examples.js
scripts.web:deploy: npm run web:install && npm run web:disc && npm run docs && npm run web:build && ./bin/web-deploy
scripts.web:disc:
npm run build:umd:fullpath && discify dist/uppy-fp.js --output website/src/_disc.html && echo '---
layout: false
---
' |cat - website/src/_disc.html > website/src/disc.html && rm website/src/_disc.html
scripts.web:install: cd website && rm -rf node_modules/hexo-renderer-uppyexamples && npm install
scripts.web:preview: cd website && parallelshell "./node_modules/.bin/hexo server --debug" "node build-examples.js watch"
scripts.web: npm run web:install && npm run web:clean && npm run web:build && npm run web:preview
